mapper.update: update tb_shopping set amount = #{amount} , price = #{price} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select email, date_format(reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date,discount,name,no from tb_coupon where email = #{email} order by REG_DATE
mapper.update: update tb_coupon set email = #{email}, used = 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_deliinfo (name, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, content, order_id) VALUES (#{name},#{phone},#{email},#{zipcode},#{address1},#{address2},#{content},#{order_id});

INSERT INTO tb_purchase (order_id, product_id, product_cnt, content, price, email, payment, discount) VALUES (#{order_id},#{product_id},#{product_cnt},#{content},#{price},#{email},#{payment},#{discount});
